alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:27PM CDT until August 08 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CLAY...NORTHWESTERN OTTER TAIL AND SOUTHWESTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cormorant, or 13 miles west of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hawley, Lake Park, Shoreham, Dunvilla, Cormorant, Dale and Rollag. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
